direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate CIDR notations for IP addresses, but for different IP versions (IPv4 vs. IPv6).
The ipV6Cidr method relies on the ipV6Address method to generate the base IPv6 address.
The ipV6Cidr method indirectly depends on getIpV6Address for generating the IPv6 address.
The getIpV6Address method uses inet6Address to create an Inet6Address object, which is crucial for ipV6Cidr.
Both ipV6Cidr and ipV6Address methods use the random().nextInt method to generate random values for the CIDR and address components.
